node_info.name: code
node_info.description: Run custom JavaScript or Python code

metadata.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Run this code only once, no matter how many input items there are

options.name: Run Once for All Items
options.description: Run this code only once, no matter how many input items there are

options.name: Run Once for Each Item
options.description: Run this code as many times as there are input items

properties.displayName: Type $ for a list of special vars/methods. Debug by using console.log() statements and viewing their output in the browser console.
properties.name: notice

properties.displayName:
(template: PRINT_INSTRUCTION)

The Python option does not support _ syntax and helpers, except for _items in all-items mode and _item in per-item mode.
properties.name: notice

workflow_examples.name: Run Once for All Items (Legacy Syntax)
Run Once for Each Item  (Legacy Syntax)

possibleValues.name: Run Once for All Items
possibleValues.description: Run this code only once, no matter how many input items there are

possibleValues.name: Run Once for Each Item
possibleValues.description: Run this code as many times as there are input items

notice.displayName:
(template: PRINT_INSTRUCTION)

The Python option does not support _ syntax and helpers, except for _items in all-items mode and _item in per-item mode.
notice.name: notice

notices.name: notice
notices.text: Type $ for a list of special vars/methods. Debug by using console.log() statements and viewing their output in the browser console.

notices.name: notice
notices.text:
(template: PRINT_INSTRUCTION)

The Python option does not support _ syntax and helpers, except for _items in all-items mode and _item in per-item mode.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
